text: Madeleine Lindberg (born 1 March 1972) is a road cyclist from Sweden. She represented her nation at the 1992 Summer Olympics and 2004 Summer Olympics. She also rode between 1993 and 2005 at the UCI Road World Championships. At the 2000 UCI Road World Championships she won the bronze medal in the women's road race. She won several times the Swedish National Road Race Championships and Swedish National Time Trial Championships. ==References== ==External links== * profile at Procyclingstats.com Category:1972 births Category:Swedish female cyclists Category:Living people Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Cyclists at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:Cyclists at the 2004 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic cyclists of Sweden
title: Madeleine Lindberg
